caption.p: Mean seasonal cycle of sea ice area in million km 2 for the region EBB3 in the northern Barents Sea. a Mean over the years 1979–2005 of satellite-derived data OSI SAF (mean: solid line, standard deviation: gray shading) and single ensemble members of CMIP5 models; historical simulation. b Mean over the years 1979–2005 of satellite-derived data OSI SAF (mean: solid line, standard deviation: gray shading) and four selected CMIP5 models; historical simulation. c Mean over the time period 2025–2040 from for CMIP5 models with emission scenarios RCP 4.5 (solid lines) and RCP 8.5 (dashed lines)
